title: All agricultural uses including stables of domestic animals, piggeries, poultry farms accessory building, tents
clause_text: All agricultural uses including stables of domestic animals, piggeries, poultry farms accessory building, tents. Garden, forestry, nursery, public parks, play fields, summer camps for recreation of all types. L.P.G. Godown subject to the following conditions :- Land should be free from live overhead power transmission or telephone lines.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: All agricultural uses including stables of domestic animals, piggeries, poultry farms accessory building, tents.
